abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Plantago erecta Morris" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Herbario de la Facultad de Farmacia de la Universidad Complutense de Madrid (MAF) 1 records from Herbario de la Universidad de Sevilla 1 records from Auckland Museum Botany Collection 1 records from MISS_DC_01MAR2006 1 records from R. L. McGregor Herbarium Vascular Plants Collection 1 records from The Vascular Plant Collection at the Herbarium Tubingense 1 records from Muestreos y recolectas de flora endémica y casi-endémica de matorral costero y chaparral de la zona mediterránea Baja California, México 1 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 1 records from SysTax - Botanical Gardens 1 records from Sistematización del Herbario Nacional Forestal Biól Luciano Vela Gálvez 1 records from Geneva Herbarium – General Collection (G) 1 records from Restauración y conservación de Isla Guadalupe 1 records from Royal BC Museum - Herbarium (V) 1 records from LSU Shirley C. Tucker Herbarium at Louisiana State University - Vascular Plants 2 records from United States National Plant Germplasm System Collection 2 records from Harvard University Herbaria: All Records 2 records from Kathryn Kalmbach Herbarium 2 records from University of New Mexico Herbarium 2 records from CHAS Botany Collection (Arctos) 2 records from UCBG TAPIR Provider 2 records from North Carolina State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 2 records from Taxon occurrence data for the FungalRoot database 2 records from University of Colorado Museum of Natural History Herbarium Vascular Plant Collection 3 records from EURISCO, The European Genetic Resources Search Catalogue 3 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium, Oslo (O) UiO 3 records from Deaver Herbarium (Northern Arizona University) 3 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 3 records from University of Alberta Vascular Plant Herbarium (ALTA-VP) 3 records from El banco de datos del Herbario HCIB en línea (Fase I): Implementación del Sistema Biótica 3 records from University of Lethbridge Herbarium (LEA) 3 records from Actualización de la base de datos del Herbario de la Universidad de Sonora (USON) 4 records from Bell Museum plants 4 records from Plant Resources Center 4 records from INSDC Sequences 4 records from Catálogo electrónico de especímenes depositados en el Herbario de la Universidad de Texas en Austin, Fase IV (Ejemplaresimagenes) 4 records from Intermountain Herbarium (Vascular plants & algae) 5 records from Vascular Plant Collection - University of Washington Herbarium (WTU) 5 records from CSIC-Real Jardín Botánico-Colección de Plantas Vasculares (MA) 5 records from Flora (vascular) y fauna (aves) de los Parques Nacionales del estado de Baja California: Constitución de 1857 y Sierra San Pedro Mártir (Plantas) 5 records from Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew - Herbarium Specimens 5 records from The New York Botanical Garden Herbarium (NY) 5 records from Desert Botanical Garden Herbarium 6 records from SJSU - Carl W. Sharsmith Herbarium, San Jose State University 7 records from Université Lyon 1 10 records from BLM - National Landscape Monitoring Framework - Plants 10 records from LOB - California State University, Long Beach Herbarium 12 records from UTEP Plants (Arctos) 14 records from Arizona State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 14 records from Carnegie Museum of Natural History Herbarium 15 records from SFV - California State University, Northridge 16 records from Digitalización y Sistematización de las Colecciones Biológicas Nacionales del Instituto de Biología, UNAM (Plantas vasculares) 17 records from Tropicos Specimen Data 22 records from MACF - MacFadden Herbarium, California State University Fullerton 23 records from CAS Botany (BOT) 25 records from Vascular Plant Collection 25 records from SDSU - San Diego State University Herbarium 29 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 33 records from CDA - California Department of Food and Agriculture 33 records from Royal Botanic Garden Edinburgh Herbarium (E) 33 records from LA - University of California, Los Angeles Herbarium 38 records from PUA - Pacific Union College Hebarium 38 records from UCSC Herbarium - Kenneth S.
